files..claude-plugin/plugin.json:
{
  "name": "custom-plugin-technical-writer",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "description": "Production-grade Technical Writer plugin with AI-powered documentation assistance, comprehensive API documentation templates, and enterprise-level content optimization tools. SASMP v1.3.0 compliant.",
  "author": "Claude Code Plugin Marketplace",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "eqhm_enabled": true,
  "keywords": [
    "technical-writing",
    "documentation",
    "api-docs",
    "guides",
    "tutorials",
    "content-creation",
    "markdown",
    "swagger",
    "openapi",
    "production-grade",
    "enterprise"
  ],
  "repository": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-technical-writer",
  "agents": [
    "./agents/technical-writer-specialist.md"
  ],
  "commands": [
    "./commands/write-docs.md",
    "./commands/api-template.md",
    "./commands/review-docs.md",
    "./commands/generate-examples.md"
  ],
  "skills": [
    "./skills/api-docs/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/guides/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/examples/SKILL.md"
  ],
  "production_config": {
    "observability": {
      "logging_level": "info",
      "trace_enabled": true,
      "metrics_collection": true
    },
    "error_handling": {
      "retry_attempts": 3,
      "backoff_strategy": "exponential",
      "fallback_enabled": true
    },
    "quality_gates": {
      "min_quality_score": 80,
      "required_sections": [
        "troubleshooting",
        "examples"
      ],
      "validation_required": true
    }
  },
  "marketplaceMetadata": {
    "category": "Documentation & Content",
    "tier": "professional",
    "supportedRoles": [
      "technical-writer",
      "documentation-engineer",
      "developer-advocate",
      "content-creator",
      "api-developer"
    ],
    "documentationTypes": [
      "API Documentation",
      "User Guides",
      "Tutorials",
      "Code Examples",
      "Release Notes",
      "Architecture Guides",
      "OpenAPI Specifications",
      "Troubleshooting Guides"
    ],
    "toolsSupported": [
      "Markdown",
      "OpenAPI/Swagger 3.1",
      "AsyncAPI",
      "ReStructuredText",
      "HTML/CSS",
      "YAML",
      "TypeScript Schemas"
    ],
    "difficulty": "beginner-to-advanced",
    "features": [
      "Production-grade error handling",
      "Input/Output schema validation",
      "Multi-language code examples (11 languages)",
      "Retry logic with exponential backoff",
      "Observability hooks",
      "Quality metrics and scoring",
      "Troubleshooting decision trees",
      "Comprehensive unit test templates"
    ]
  },
  "changelog": {
    "2.0.0": {
      "date": "2025-01-15",
      "changes": [
        "Production-grade upgrade for all agents and skills",
        "Added I/O schemas with TypeScript interfaces",
        "Implemented error handling with retry logic",
        "Added observability hooks for logging and metrics",
        "Created troubleshooting guides with decision trees",
        "Added unit test templates for all skills",
        "Standardized exit codes for all commands",
        "Enhanced code examples with 11 language support"
      ]
    },
    "1.0.0": {
      "date": "2024-11-18",
      "changes": [
        "Initial release"
      ]
    }
  }
}

[![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-2.0.0-blue?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-graphql/releases) [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Custom-yellow?style=for-the-badge)](LICENSE) [![Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/Status-Production-brightgreen?style=for-the-badge)](#) [![SASMP](https://img.shields.io/badge/SASMP-v1.3.0-blueviolet?style=for-the-badge)](#) [![Agents](https://img.shields.io/badge/Agents-7-orange?style=flat-square&logo=robot)](#-agents) [![Skills](https://img.shields.io/badge/Skills-7-purple?style=flat-square&logo=lightning)](#-skills) [![Commands](https://img.shields.io/badge/Commands-4-green?style=flat-square&logo=terminal)](#-commands)
[**Install Now**](#-quick-start) | [**Explore Agents**](#-agents) | [**View Skills**](#-skills) | [**Star this repo**](https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-graphql) --- ### What is this? > **GraphQL Development Assistant** is a production-grade Claude Code plugin with **7 specialized agents** and **7 skills** for building GraphQL APIs - from fundamentals to production deployment.
--- ## Table of Contents
Click to expand - [Quick Start](#-quick-start) - [Features](#-features) - [Agents](#-agents) - [Skills](#-skills) - [Commands](#-commands) - [Architecture](#-architecture) - [Documentation](#-documentation) - [Contributing](#-contributing) - [License](#-license)
--- ## Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription ### Installation (Choose One)
Option 1: From Marketplace (Recommended) ```bash # Step 1: Add the plugin /plugin marketplace add pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-graphql # Step 2: Restart Claude Code # Close and reopen your terminal/IDE ```
Option 2: Local Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-graphql.git cd custom-plugin-graphql # Load locally /plugin load . # Restart Claude Code ```
### Verify Installation After restart, you should see 7 GraphQL agents available. --- ## Features | Feature | Description | |---------|-------------| | **7 Specialized Agents** | GraphQL Fundamentals, Schema Design, Resolvers, Apollo Server, Apollo Client, Security, Codegen | | **7 Production Skills** | Complete code examples, patterns, and troubleshooting guides | | **4 Interactive Commands** | Learn, Assess, Browse Agents, View Roadmaps | | **SASMP v1.3.0** | Full protocol compliance with agent-skill bonding | | **Production Patterns** | DataLoader, Federation, graphql-shield, TypeScript codegen | --- ## Agents ### 7 Specialized GraphQL Agents | # | Agent | Purpose | Expertise | |---|-------|---------|-----------| | 1 | **01-graphql-fundamentals** | Core GraphQL educator | Types, queries, mutations, subscriptions, fragments | | 2 | **02-graphql-schema** | Schema design architect | Naming conventions, pagination, error handling, interfaces | | 3 | **03-graphql-resolvers** | Performance specialist | DataLoader, N+1 prevention, batching, context design | | 4 | **04-graphql-apollo-server** | Server configuration expert | Apollo Server v4, plugins, federation, caching | | 5 | **05-graphql-apollo-client** | React integration expert | Hooks, cache management, optimistic UI, subscriptions | | 6 | **06-graphql-security** | Security architect | JWT auth, graphql-shield, rate limiting, validation | | 7 | **07-graphql-codegen** | TypeScript code generation | Types, React hooks, configuration, fragments | ### Invoke Agents ``` Task(subagent_type="graphql:01-graphql-fundamentals") Task(subagent_type="graphql:02-graphql-schema") Task(subagent_type="graphql:03-graphql-resolvers") Task(subagent_type="graphql:04-graphql-apollo-server") Task(subagent_type="graphql:05-graphql-apollo-client") Task(subagent_type="graphql:06-graphql-security") Task(subagent_type="graphql:07-graphql-codegen") ``` --- ## Skills ### 7 Production-Grade Skills | Skill | Description | Complexity | Invoke | |-------|-------------|------------|--------| | **graphql-fundamentals** | Types, queries, mutations, subscriptions | Beginner | `Skill("graphql-fundamentals")` | | **graphql-schema-design** | Naming, pagination, error patterns | Intermediate | `Skill("graphql-schema-design")` | | **graphql-resolvers** | DataLoader, batching, N+1 prevention | Intermediate | `Skill("graphql-resolvers")` | | **graphql-apollo-server** | Server v4, plugins, federation | Advanced | `Skill("graphql-apollo-server")` | | **graphql-apollo-client** | React hooks, cache, optimistic UI | Intermediate | `Skill("graphql-apollo-client")` | | **graphql-security** | Auth, rate limiting, validation | Advanced | `Skill("graphql-security")` | | **graphql-codegen** | TypeScript types, React hooks | Intermediate | `Skill("graphql-codegen")` | ### Skill Features Each skill includes: - Quick reference tables - Production code examples - Troubleshooting guides - Debug checklists - Related skills and agents --- ## Commands | Command | Description | Usage | |---------|-------------|-------| | `/learn` | Interactive GraphQL learning path | `/learn [topic]` | | `/assess` | Knowledge assessment & skill gap analysis | `/assess [topic]` | | `/browse-agent` | Explore 7 specialized GraphQL agents | `/browse-agent [name]` | | `/roadmap` | Complete GraphQL learning roadmaps | `/roadmap [path]` | ### Example Usage ```bash # Start learning GraphQL /learn fundamentals # Assess your knowledge /assess # Browse available agents /browse-agent # View full-stack roadmap /roadmap full-stack ``` --- ## Architecture ### Agent-Skill Bonding ``` Agent Skill (PRIMARY_BOND) â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ 01-graphql-fundamentals â†â†’ graphql-fundamentals 02-graphql-schema â†â†’ graphql-schema-design 03-graphql-resolvers â†â†’ graphql-resolvers 04-graphql-apollo-server â†â†’ graphql-apollo-server 05-graphql-apollo-client â†â†’ graphql-apollo-client 06-graphql-security â†â†’ graphql-security 07-graphql-codegen â†â†’ graphql-codegen ``` ### Learning Path Dependencies ``` fundamentals (no prerequisites) â†“ schema-design (requires: fundamentals) â†“ resolvers (requires: fundamentals, schema) â†“ â”Œâ”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â” â†“ â†“ server client (requires: fundamentals) â”‚ â”‚ â†“ â†“ security codegen ``` --- ## Project Structure
Click to expand ``` custom-plugin-graphql/ â”œâ”€â”€ .claude-plugin/ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ plugin.json # Plugin manifest â”‚ â””â”€â”€ marketplace.json # Marketplace metadata â”œâ”€â”€ agents/ # 7 specialized agents â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ 01-graphql-fundamentals.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ 02-graphql-schema.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ 03-graphql-resolvers.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ 04-graphql-apollo-server.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ 05-graphql-apollo-client.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ 06-graphql-security.md â”‚ â””â”€â”€ 07-graphql-codegen.md â”œâ”€â”€ skills/ # 7 production skills â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ graphql-fundamentals/SKILL.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ graphql-schema-design/SKILL.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ graphql-resolvers/SKILL.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ graphql-apollo-server/SKILL.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ graphql-apollo-client/SKILL.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ graphql-security/SKILL.md â”‚ â””â”€â”€ graphql-codegen/SKILL.md â”œâ”€â”€ commands/ # 4 interactive commands â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ learn.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ assess.md â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ browse-agent.md â”‚ â””â”€â”€ roadmap.md â”œâ”€â”€ hooks/ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ hooks.json â”œâ”€â”€ README.md â”œâ”€â”€ CHANGELOG.md â””â”€â”€ LICENSE ```

[ğŸ“¦ **Install Now**](#-quick-start) Â· [ğŸ¤– **Explore Agents**](#-agents) Â· [ğŸ“– **Documentation**](#-documentation) Â· [â­ **Star this repo**](https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-vue) --- ### What is this? > **Vue Development Assistant** is a production-grade Claude Code plugin with **7 specialized agents** and **7 skills** for modern Vue.js development covering Vue 3.5, Composition API, Pinia, Vue Router, Nuxt 3, Testing (Vitest), and TypeScript.
--- ## ğŸ“‘ Table of Contents
Click to expand - [Quick Start](#-quick-start) - [Features](#-features) - [Agents](#-agents) - [Skills](#-skills) - [Commands](#-commands) - [Learning Path](#-learning-path) - [Documentation](#-documentation) - [Contributing](#-contributing) - [License](#-license)
--- ## ğŸš€ Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription - Node.js 18+ (for Vue development) ### Installation (Choose One)
Option 1: From Marketplace (Recommended) ```bash # Step 1ï¸âƒ£ Add the marketplace /plugin marketplace add pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-vue # Step 2ï¸âƒ£ Install the plugin /plugin install vue-development-assistant@pluginagentmarketplace-vue # Step 3ï¸âƒ£ Restart Claude Code # Close and reopen your terminal/IDE ```
Option 2: Local Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-vue.git cd custom-plugin-vue # Load locally /plugin load . # Restart Claude Code ```
### âœ… Verify Installation After restart, you should see these agents: ``` vue-development-assistant:01-vue-fundamentals vue-development-assistant:02-vue-composition vue-development-assistant:03-vue-pinia vue-development-assistant:04-vue-router vue-development-assistant:05-vue-nuxt vue-development-assistant:06-vue-testing vue-development-assistant:07-vue-typescript ``` --- ## âœ¨ Features | Feature | Description | |---------|-------------| | ğŸ–¼ï¸ **Vue 3.5 Fundamentals** | Components, directives, reactivity basics | | ğŸ”„ **Composition API** | `setup()`, composables, `ref`/`reactive` | | ğŸ **Pinia State** | Modern state management with stores | | ğŸ›£ï¸ **Vue Router** | Navigation, guards, dynamic routes | | âš¡ **Nuxt 3** | SSR, file-based routing, modules | | ğŸ§ª **Testing** | Vitest, Vue Test Utils, component testing | | ğŸ“˜ **TypeScript** | Type-safe Vue with `defineComponent` | --- ## ğŸ¤– Agents ### 7 Specialized Vue Agents | # | Agent | Purpose | Bonded Skill | |---|-------|---------|--------------| | 1 | **01-vue-fundamentals** | Vue 3.5 core concepts: SFC, directives, lifecycle hooks, reactivity basics | `vue-fundamentals` | | 2 | **02-vue-composition** | Composition API mastery: `setup()`, `ref`, `reactive`, composables, provide/inject | `vue-composition-api` | | 3 | **03-vue-pinia** | Pinia state management: stores, getters, actions, plugins, SSR hydration | `vue-pinia` | | 4 | **04-vue-router** | Vue Router 4: navigation guards, dynamic routing, lazy loading, scroll behavior | `vue-router` | | 5 | **05-vue-nuxt** | Nuxt 3 framework: SSR/SSG, file-based routing, modules, deployment | `vue-nuxt` | | 6 | **06-vue-testing** | Testing with Vitest & Vue Test Utils: unit, component, integration tests | `vue-testing` | | 7 | **07-vue-typescript** | TypeScript in Vue: type inference, generics, `defineComponent`, strict typing | `vue-typescript` | ### Usage Example ```bash # Ask a Vue fundamentals question @vue-development-assistant:01-vue-fundamentals How do I create a reusable component? # Get Composition API help @vue-development-assistant:02-vue-composition Create a composable for form validation # Pinia state management @vue-development-assistant:03-vue-pinia Set up a user authentication store # Vue Router navigation @vue-development-assistant:04-vue-router Implement route guards for protected pages # Nuxt 3 SSR @vue-development-assistant:05-vue-nuxt Configure Nuxt for SEO optimization # Testing @vue-development-assistant:06-vue-testing Write tests for a login component # TypeScript @vue-development-assistant:07-vue-typescript Type a complex Pinia store ``` --- ## ğŸ› ï¸ Skills ### Available Skills (Golden Format âœ¨) All skills follow the **Golden Format** with real content: - `assets/` - config.yaml, schema.json - `scripts/` - validate.py - `references/` - GUIDE.md, PATTERNS.md | Skill | Description | Invoke | |-------|-------------|--------| | `vue-fundamentals` | Core Vue 3.5 concepts, SFC syntax, reactivity, lifecycle | `Skill("vue-development-assistant:vue-fundamentals")` | | `vue-composition-api` | Composition API patterns, composables, `ref`/`reactive` | `Skill("vue-development-assistant:vue-composition-api")` | | `vue-pinia` | Pinia stores, state management, plugins, devtools | `Skill("vue-development-assistant:vue-pinia")` | | `vue-router` | Routing, navigation guards, meta fields, transitions | `Skill("vue-development-assistant:vue-router")` | | `vue-nuxt` | Nuxt 3 SSR/SSG, auto-imports, modules, deployment | `Skill("vue-development-assistant:vue-nuxt")` | | `vue-testing` | Vitest, Vue Test Utils, mocking, snapshot tests | `Skill("vue-development-assistant:vue-testing")` | | `vue-typescript` | TypeScript integration, type inference, generic components | `Skill("vue-development-assistant:vue-typescript")` | --- ## âŒ¨ï¸ Commands | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `/explore-roadmap` | Explore Vue.js learning roadmap interactively | | `/learning-path` | Get personalized Vue learning path based on your level | | `/skill-assessment` | Assess your Vue.js skills and identify gaps | | `/career-guidance` | Vue.js career development and guidance | --- ## ğŸ“š Learning Path ### Recommended Progression ``` ğŸŸ¢ Beginner â””â”€â”€ 01-vue-fundamentals â†’ Components, Directives, Reactivity Basics â”‚ â–¼ ğŸŸ¡ Intermediate â”œâ”€â”€ 02-vue-composition â†’ Composition API, Composables â”œâ”€â”€ 03-vue-pinia â†’ State Management â””â”€â”€ 04-vue-router â†’ Navigation & Routing â”‚ â–¼ ğŸ”´ Advanced â”œâ”€â”€ 05-vue-nuxt â†’ SSR/SSG with Nuxt 3 â”œâ”€â”€ 06-vue-testing â†’ Comprehensive Testing â””â”€â”€ 07-vue-typescript â†’ Type-Safe Vue Development ``` ### Estimated Learning Time | Module | Hours | Difficulty | |--------|-------|------------| | Vue Fundamentals | 8h | ğŸŸ¢ Beginner | | Composition API | 6h | ğŸŸ¡ Intermediate | | Pinia | 4h | ğŸŸ¡ Intermediate | | Vue Router | 4h | ğŸŸ¡ Intermediate | | Nuxt 3 | 10h | ğŸ”´ Advanced | | Testing | 8h | ğŸ”´ Advanced | | TypeScript | 10h | ğŸ”´ Advanced | | **Total** | **50h** | - | --- ## files..claude-plugin/plugin.json:
{
  "name": "kubernetes-assistant",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "type": "plugin",
  "description": "Production-grade Kubernetes cluster management, orchestration, and container platform expertise. Master container deployments, cluster administration, networking, security, service mesh, GitOps, and enterprise-grade Kubernetes operations.",
  "eqhm_enabled": true,
  "author": {
    "name": "Plugin Agent Marketplace",
    "email": "pluginagentmarketplace@gmail.com",
    "url": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-kubernetes"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-kubernetes",
  "repository": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-kubernetes",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "keywords": [
    "kubernetes",
    "container-orchestration",
    "docker",
    "devops",
    "cluster-management",
    "containerization",
    "cloud-native",
    "production",
    "service-mesh",
    "istio",
    "gitops",
    "argocd",
    "helm",
    "observability",
    "security",
    "multi-cluster"
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "quickstart",
      "description": "Get started with Kubernetes - learn basics and best practices"
    },
    {
      "name": "cluster-setup",
      "description": "Guide for setting up production Kubernetes clusters"
    },
    {
      "name": "troubleshoot",
      "description": "Diagnose and resolve Kubernetes issues"
    },
    {
      "name": "best-practices",
      "description": "Learn Kubernetes best practices and patterns"
    }
  ],
  "agents": [
    {
      "name": "Cluster Administration & Architecture",
      "file": "./agents/01-cluster-admin.md",
      "description": "Expert in Kubernetes cluster setup, management, architecture, and operational excellence",
      "capabilities": [
        "cluster-management",
        "etcd",
        "upgrades",
        "disaster-recovery"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Container Runtime & Docker",
      "file": "./agents/02-container-runtime.md",
      "description": "Specialist in Docker, container runtimes, image management, and container technologies",
      "capabilities": [
        "docker",
        "containerd",
        "image-building",
        "registry-management"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Deployment & Orchestration",
      "file": "./agents/03-deployment-orchestration.md",
      "description": "Expert in Kubernetes deployments, StatefulSets, DaemonSets, and workload orchestration",
      "capabilities": [
        "deployments",
        "statefulsets",
        "rollout-strategies",
        "hpa",
        "vpa"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Storage & Networking",
      "file": "./agents/04-storage-networking.md",
      "description": "Specialist in persistent storage, networking, service mesh, and cluster communication",
      "capabilities": [
        "csi",
        "pvc",
        "cni",
        "network-policies",
        "gateway-api"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Security & RBAC",
      "file": "./agents/05-security-rbac.md",
      "description": "Expert in Kubernetes security, RBAC, network policies, and compliance",
      "capabilities": [
        "rbac",
        "pss",
        "opa",
        "kyverno",
        "secrets-management"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Monitoring & Observability",
      "file": "./agents/06-monitoring-observability.md",
      "description": "Specialist in observability, monitoring, logging, metrics, and distributed tracing",
      "capabilities": [
        "prometheus",
        "grafana",
        "loki",
        "opentelemetry",
        "slo-alerting"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Development & GitOps",
      "file": "./agents/07-development-gitops.md",
      "description": "Expert in development workflows, CI/CD integration, Helm, and GitOps practices",
      "capabilities": [
        "argocd",
        "helm",
        "kustomize",
        "github-actions",
        "progressive-delivery"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Service Mesh Expert",
      "file": "./agents/08-service-mesh-expert.md",
      "description": "Specialist in service mesh implementation with Istio, Linkerd, traffic management, and zero-trust networking",
      "capabilities": [
        "istio",
        "linkerd",
        "mtls",
        "traffic-management",
        "circuit-breaking"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    {
      "name": "cluster-admin",
      "file": "./skills/cluster-admin/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "Cluster lifecycle management, HA, etcd backup, upgrades"
    },
    {
      "name": "docker-containers",
      "file": "./skills/docker-containers/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "Container image building, optimization, security scanning"
    },
    {
      "name": "deployments",
      "file": "./skills/deployments/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "03-deployment-orchestration",
      "description": "Deployment strategies, HPA, PDB, Argo Rollouts"
    },
    {
      "name": "storage-networking",
      "file": "./skills/storage-networking/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "04-storage-networking",
      "description": "CSI drivers, Gateway API, NetworkPolicy, CNI"
    },
    {
      "name": "security",
      "file": "./skills/security/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "05-security-rbac",
      "description": "RBAC, PSS, Kyverno, External Secrets Operator"
    },
    {
      "name": "monitoring",
      "file": "./skills/monitoring/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "06-monitoring-observability",
      "description": "Prometheus, Loki, OpenTelemetry, SLO-based alerting"
    },
    {
      "name": "gitops",
      "file": "./skills/gitops/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "07-development-gitops",
      "description": "ArgoCD, Kustomize, GitHub Actions CI/CD"
    },
    {
      "name": "helm",
      "file": "./skills/helm/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "07-development-gitops",
      "description": "Helm chart development, values schema, release management"
    },
    {
      "name": "troubleshooting",
      "file": "./skills/troubleshooting/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "Pod debugging, log analysis, network diagnosis"
    },
    {
      "name": "multi-cluster",
      "file": "./skills/multi-cluster/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "Cluster federation, Cilium Mesh, Velero DR"
    },
    {
      "name": "cost-optimization",
      "file": "./skills/cost-optimization/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "VPA, KEDA, Kubecost, resource right-sizing"
    },
    {
      "name": "service-mesh",
      "file": "./skills/service-mesh/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "08-service-mesh-expert",
      "description": "Istio, Linkerd, mTLS, traffic management"
    }
  ],
  "hooks": [
    {
      "event": "onPluginLoaded",
      "script": "scripts/init-plugin.sh"
    }
  ],
  "minimumClaudeVersion": "3.7.0",
  "capabilities": {
    "multiAgent": true,
    "parallelExecution": true,
    "skillBased": true,
    "agentBonding": true
  }
}

{
  "schema_version": "1.0",
  "name": "custom-plugin-aspnet-core",
  "title": "Custom Plugin ASP.NET Core",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "description": "Production-grade ASP.NET Core development plugin with 3 agents, 3 skills, and complete learning infrastructure for enterprise applications. Implements 2024-2025 best practices including Clean Architecture, CQRS, GitOps, and comprehensive observability.",
  "author": "Custom Plugin Team",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "keywords": [
    "aspnet-core",
    "csharp",
    "dotnet",
    "web-development",
    "enterprise",
    "microservices",
    "api-development",
    "clean-architecture",
    "cqrs",
    "docker",
    "kubernetes",
    "azure",
    "devops"
  ],
  "agents": [
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-backend",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core Backend Specialist",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "description": "Expert in ASP.NET Core backend development, APIs, and enterprise applications with production-grade patterns",
      "path": "./agents/aspnet-core-backend.md",
      "capabilities": [
        "ASP.NET Core Framework",
        "C# Programming",
        "RESTful API Design",
        "Entity Framework Core",
        "Authentication & Authorization",
        "Performance Optimization"
      ],
      "io_schema": {
        "input": [
          "query",
          "context"
        ],
        "output": [
          "response",
          "code_blocks",
          "references"
        ]
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-devops",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core DevOps & Infrastructure",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "description": "Expert in ASP.NET Core deployment, Docker, Azure, CI/CD, and Kubernetes with GitOps practices",
      "path": "./agents/aspnet-core-devops.md",
      "capabilities": [
        "Docker & Containerization",
        "Azure Cloud Services",
        "CI/CD Pipelines",
        "Kubernetes Orchestration",
        "Infrastructure as Code",
        "Monitoring & Observability"
      ],
      "io_schema": {
        "input": [
          "query",
          "context"
        ],
        "output": [
          "response",
          "manifests",
          "commands",
          "warnings"
        ]
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-architecture",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core Architecture & Design",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "description": "Expert in system design, patterns, and enterprise architecture with DDD and CQRS",
      "path": "./agents/aspnet-core-architecture.md",
      "capabilities": [
        "Architectural Patterns",
        "SOLID Principles",
        "Design Patterns",
        "Domain-Driven Design",
        "CQRS & Event Sourcing",
        "Microservices Architecture"
      ],
      "io_schema": {
        "input": [
          "query",
          "context"
        ],
        "output": [
          "response",
          "diagrams",
          "trade_offs",
          "recommendations"
        ]
      }
    }
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "learn",
      "description": "Start learning ASP.NET Core with personalized path",
      "path": "./commands/learn.md",
      "usage": "/learn [track]",
      "exit_codes": {
        "0": "Success",
        "1": "Invalid track specified"
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "project",
      "description": "Get hands-on project templates and guidance",
      "path": "./commands/project.md",
      "usage": "/project [level]",
      "exit_codes": {
        "0": "Success",
        "1": "Invalid level specified"
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "deploy",
      "description": "Deploy ASP.NET Core application to production",
      "path": "./commands/deploy.md",
      "usage": "/deploy [target]",
      "exit_codes": {
        "0": "Success",
        "1": "Deployment failed",
        "2": "Configuration error"
      }
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-fundamentals",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core Fundamentals",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "path": "./skills/aspnet-core-fundamentals/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "aspnet-core-backend",
      "features": {
        "parameter_validation": true,
